Content: i suggest you wait till Thursday to see what OpenSocial has to offer.

Author: thomasfl
Content: Agree. Makes you think backing by YC can't be that hard to get.

Author: nkohari
Content: While they might resist at first, Facebook is likely to join in and support the OpenSocial API. That doesn't mean F8 is going anywhere, but OpenSocial has a lot of potential to unify social networks on the web, and I doubt Facebook wants to be left out in the cold.

Author: michael_nielsen
Title: Open Social: a new universe of social applications all over the web (Marc Andreessen)
